author: Madeline Holcombe, CNN
title: Measures: Local officials begin penalizing people breaking stay at home orders
description: Officials are racing to get a handle on the novel coronavirus as the number of deaths nears 1,000 in the United States and cases in two of the hardest hit states -- California and New York -- quickly multiply.
content:
(CNN)Officials are racing to get a handle on the novel coronavirus as the number of deaths nears 1,000 in the United Statesand cases in two of the hardest hit states -- California and New York -- quickly multiply.
